newsItems.title: Face Masks
newsItems.description: Face masks available at the registration desk
We are providing face masks for participants who need or want one. You can pick one up at the registration desk.

description.title: Weekend activity
description.description: A guided walk through the city of Leuven
description.fullMessage: You've marvelled at Leuven's pretty city center, and you're curious about the stories and secrets that lie behind these historic facades? Kris Heylen, Leuven connaisseur par excellence, will take you on a guided walk of Leuven, this Saturday 3rd August, 2pm-4pm. Registration is free! Sign up using the form you'll find on Discord.

description.title: Room Change
description.description: Computational Models for Semantic Change in Aula Jean Monnet
description.fullMessage: The course Computational Models for Semantic Change and their Applications in Multidisciplinary Research by Haim Dubossarsky and Pierluigi Cassotti (2:00pm - 3:30pm) will be held in Aula Jean Monnet for the remainder of the week.

description.title: Room Change
description.description: Categorial Foundations of Natural Language Structures in Aula Jean Monnet
description.fullMessage: The course Categorial Foundations of Natural Language Structures by Mark Steedman (11:00am - 12:30pm) will be held in Aula Jean Monnet for the remainder of the week.

description.title: Room Change
description.description: Generative AI and Symbolic Knowledge Representations in Aula Jean Monnet
description.fullMessage: The course Generative AI and Symbolic Knowledge Representations: Large Language Models, Knowledge, and Reasoning by Damir Cavar and Billy Dickson (9:00 - 10:30am) will be held in Aula Jean Monnet for the remainder of the week.

description.title: Room Change
description.description: Expressivity of Transformers in Aula Jean Monnet
description.fullMessage: The course Expressivity of Transformers: Logic, Circuits, and Formal Languages by Jonathan Rawski and David Chiang (5:00pm - 6:30pm) will be held in Aula Jean Monnet for the remainder of the week.

description.title: Room Change
description.description: Emma Vorlat lectures switched to Jean Monnet
description.fullMessage: Room change: as Emma Vorlat has been heating up beyond comfortable, we're switching lecture halls. Starting at 5pm, lectures taking place in Emma Vorlat will be switched to Jean Monnet for the remainder of the week.

description.title: Room Change
description.fullMessage: The course Games Logicians Play by Valentin Goranko (11:00am-12:30pm) will be held in room AV 00.17 for the remainder of the week.

description.title: Welcome Reception Al Fresco
description.fullMessage: Have the welcome reception inside when the weather is this nice? That would be a shame! The welcome reception will be held outside, on the square with the funny statue. Start at 6:30pm, right after the final lecture slot.

description.title: Water Fountains
description.description: Fill up your bottle at the water fountains.
description.fullMessage: It promises to be a hot week! Looking to (re)fill your bottle? There are two water fountains on site: one is located in the entrance hall of Jean Monnet, the other one is next to the on campus statue. On the discord #announcements channel, you'll find a map and some pictures.

description.title: Breakfast & Registration
description.description: Come register and have breakfast at 8am.
description.fullMessage: Registration will start at 8am today. Remember to bring your personal registration code. Also remember that a complimentary breakfast buffet is served at Alma 2 from 8am till 9am!

description.title: Shared Photo Album
description.description: Contribute to our shared Google Photos album.
description.fullMessage: We have created a shared photo album on Google Photos for the ESSLLI summer school in Leuven. You can find the link on the ESSLLI website and on Discord. Everyone with the link can view and add photos, so feel free to share the link with fellow participants.

description.title: Course Cancellations
description.description: Due to covid, two courses will need to be cancelled.
description.fullMessage: Unfortunately covid hit some of our lecturers. As a result, two courses will need to be cancelled: Dan Zeman -  The Semantics and Pragmatics of Slurs (Introductory) and Nazarre Merchant and Alan Prince - Analyzing OT Typologies: Order, Equivalence and the Mother of all Tableaux (Advanced). The schedule will be updated accordingly.

description.title: Internet Access
description.description: More information on internet access on campus and at the student residences.
description.fullMessage: Up to date wifi credentials can be found on the 'About' Tab of this app. If you need to access a wired connection (or private router connected to the wired network), please get in touch with esslli2024@kuleuven.be

description.title: Welcome to ESSLLI 2024!
description.description: We're excited to have you in Leuven.
description.fullMessage: We're excited to have you in Leuven. The first students are starting to arrive at the residences, the badges have been printed, and the goodie bags are filled. We're looking forward to an inspiring time with all of you!
